front.title: Analysis of OSPF Security According to the Keying and Authentication for Routing Protocols (KARP) Design Guide

abstract.t: This document analyzes OSPFv2 and OSPFv3 according to the guidelines set forth in Section 4.2 of the "Keying and Authentication for Routing Protocols (KARP) Design Guidelines" (RFC 6518). Key components of solutions to gaps identified in this document are already underway.
